_blueprint.description: Documents the VFS version control tools manifest.

tools.name: vfs_log
tools.description: Returns the commit history for a file in the Virtual File System.

path.description: The full path to the artifact.

tools.name: vfs_diff
tools.description: Returns the diff between two versions of a file.

path.description: The full path to the artifact.

refA.description: The commit SHA or ref for the first version.

refB.description: The commit SHA or ref for the second version. Defaults to HEAD.

tools.name: vfs_revert
tools.description: Reverts a file to a previous state. This is a destructive operation.

path.description: The full path to the artifact to revert.

commit_sha.description: The commit SHA to revert the file to.
